Elements.Name: SkeletonType
Description: This determines which drift animations are going to be used.
If you are not using any character mods or using mods based on the vanilla Generations model, use the Sonic Generations skeleton.
If you are playing with an Unleashed model mod, use the Sonic Unleashed skeleton.
Use drift animations made for Sonic Generations skeleton.
Use drift animations made for Sonic Unleashed skeleton.
